languages.text: "Тогда нам нужно уединиться. В твоих покоях никто не потревожит нас. Идем".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда нам нужно уединиться. В твоих покоях никто не потревожит нас. Идем".

languages.text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."
languages.original_text: "Тогда нам нужно уединиться. В твоих покоях никто не потревожит нас. Идем".

traits.locale_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

"Then we need a place where we would be alone. A hallowed place where His whispers would echo within the walls of faith's cradle. I know of only one such place on the upper decks — the chapel for senior officers. Come."
"Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

"Then we need a place where we can be alone, a hallowed place where His whispers can echo within the walls of faith's cradle. I know of only one such place on the upper decks — the chapel for senior officers. Come."
"Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."
"Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."
"Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."
"Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

languages.text: «En ese caso, necesitamos un lugar donde podamos estar a solas. Nadie nos interrumpirá en sus aposentos. Venga».
languages.original_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, necesitamos un lugar donde podamos estar a solas. Nadie nos interrumpirá en sus aposentos. Venga».

languages.text: 「それなら、一人になれる場所が必要よ。あなたの部屋なら誰も邪魔しないでしょう。行きましょう」
languages.original_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

traits.locale_text: 「それなら、一人になれる場所が必要よ。あなたの部屋なら誰も邪魔しないでしょう。行きましょう」

languages.text: “既然如此，我们需要找个可以独处的地方。去你的房间吧，这样就没人会打扰我们了，来吧。”
languages.original_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我们需要找个可以独处的地方。去你的房间吧，这样就没人会打扰我们了，来吧。”

languages.text: "Dann brauchen wir einen Ort, an dem wir allein sein können. In Euren Gemächern wird uns niemand stören. Kommt."
languages.original_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

traits.locale_text: "Dann brauchen wir einen Ort, an dem wir allein sein können. In Euren Gemächern wird uns niemand stören. Kommt."

languages.text: « Alors, il nous faut un endroit où nous pourrons nous isoler. Personne ne viendra nous déranger dans vos quartiers. Venez. »
languages.original_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, il nous faut un endroit où nous pourrons nous isoler. Personne ne viendra nous déranger dans vos quartiers. Venez. »

languages.original_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone, a hallowed place where His whispers can echo within the walls of faith's cradle. I know of only one such place on the upper decks — the chapel for senior officers. Come."

languages.text: "O hâlde baş başa kalabileceğimiz bir yere gitmeliyiz. Odanda kimse bizi rahatsız etmeyecektir. Gel."
languages.original_text: "Then we need a place where we can be alone. No one will disturb us in your chambers. Come."
